languages.text: {n}Опытный дознаватель, к тому же биомант, не выдал бы себя языком тела. Он играет с вами. Ловушка в самой постановке вопроса — он убеждает вас, что есть лишь два ответа, но что, если они оба... верные или неверные?{/n}

{n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Опытный дознаватель, к тому же биомант, не выдал бы себя языком тела. Он играет с вами. Ловушка в самой постановке вопроса — он убеждает вас, что есть лишь два ответа, но что, если они оба... верные или неверные?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}An experienced Interrogator, who also happens to be a biomancer, would not have given himself away with body language. He is playing you. The trap lies in the phrasing of the rules — he is trying to convince you that only two answers exist, but what if both of those answers are... correct or incorrect?{/n}

{n}An experienced Interrogator, who also happens to be a biomancer, would not have given himself away with body language. He is playing you. The trap lies in the phrasing of the rules — he is trying to convince you that only two answers exist, but what if both of those answers are... correct or incorrect?{/n}

{n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}

The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}

{n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix est un interrogateur chevronné, doublé d'un biomancien de talent. Ce n'est qu'une ruse... Il est trop doué pour laisser son langage corporel le trahir. Le véritable piège réside dans la manière dont il a posé les règles : il veut vous faire croire qu'il n'y a que deux réponses possibles, mais se pourrait-il qu'il en existe une troisième ? Et si sa déclaration était à la fois vraie et fausse ?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix est un interrogateur chevronné, doublé d'un biomancien de talent. Ce n'est qu'une ruse... Il est trop doué pour laisser son langage corporel le trahir. Le véritable piège réside dans la manière dont il a posé les règles : il veut vous faire croire qu'il n'y a que deux réponses possibles, mais se pourrait-il qu'il en existe une troisième ? Et si sa déclaration était à la fois vraie et fausse ?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix es un interrogador y biomante veterano. No es más que un truco... Es demasiado hábil como para revelar nada a través del lenguaje corporal. La auténtica trampa está en la forma en la que ha explicado las reglas: quiere que creas que solo hay dos respuestas, pero ¿y si hay una tercera? ¿Y si es a la vez cierto y falso?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}

La auténtica trampa está en la forma en la que ha explicado las reglas: quiere que creas que solo hay dos respuestas, pero ¿y si hay una tercera? ¿Y si es a la vez cierto y falso?{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希是位经验丰富的审讯官，非常擅长生物系灵能。你看到的反应只不过是个陷阱而已……像他这么经验丰富的人，根本不可能会通过肢体语言暴露自己，真正的陷阱在于他阐述规则的方式。他想让你以为他的话非真即假，可如果还有第三个答案呢？如果他的措辞既是真的，又是假的呢？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希是位经验丰富的审讯官，非常擅长生物系灵能。你看到的反应只不过是个陷阱而已……像他这么经验丰富的人，根本不可能会通过肢体语言暴露自己，真正的陷阱在于他阐述规则的方式。他想让你以为他的话非真即假，可如果还有第三个答案呢？如果他的措辞既是真的，又是假的呢？{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは経験豊富なインテロゲイターであり、バイオマンサーでもある。これは単なるトリックだ…彼は熟練しているので、身振り手振りで自分の正体を見破ることはできない。本当の罠は、ルールの説明の仕方にある。彼は答えは2つしかないと思わせたいのだが、3つ目の選択肢があるとしたら？彼の発言が本当でもあり、嘘でもあるとしたら？{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは経験豊富なインテロゲイターであり、バイオマンサーでもある。これは単なるトリックだ…彼は熟練しているので、身振り手振りで自分の正体を見破ることはできない。本当の罠は、ルールの説明の仕方にある。彼は答えは2つしかないと思わせたいのだが、3つ目の選択肢があるとしたら？彼の発言が本当でもあり、嘘でもあるとしたら？{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ist ein erfahrener Interrogator und zudem Biomantiker. Das ist nur ein Trick ... Er ist zu gut, um sich durch Körpersprache selbst zu verraten. Die wahre Falle liegt darin, wie er die Regeln formuliert hat. Er will dich glauben lassen, dass nur zwei Antworten existieren, doch was, wenn es eine dritte Option gibt? Was, wenn seine Aussage sowohl wahr als auch falsch ist?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, deneyimli bir Sorgucu ve biyobaz. Bu yalnızca bir numara. Kendisini beden diliyle ele vermeyecek kadar yeteneklidir. Asıl tuzak, kuralları ifade ediş biçiminde yatıyor: Yalnızca iki yanıtın var olduğunu düşünmeni istiyor ama ya üçüncü bir seçenek varsa? Ya bu önermesi hem doğru hem yanlışsa?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix is an experienced Interrogator and a biomancer. This is just a trick... He is too skilled to give himself away through body language. The real trap lies in the way he phrased the rules — he wants you to think that only two answers exist, but what if there's a third option? What if his statement is both true and false?{/n}
